item.description:
Thanks to fellow members Joana and Nicole for suggesting this night of Samba fun.

They're your points of contact so ask for them after you purchase your $10 ticket from Ryles.

The plan is to meet at 8 PM for informal conversation. No pressure to speak completely in Portuguese. You can get comfortable by just listening then jump in the conversation when you're ready. If you arrive hungry Ryles has good food for you to buy, so please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

Then enjoy the Samba Tremeterra show which should begin by 9:30 PM. This group performs very lively music with carnival-type dancing girls.

Check out details on Ryles link

Samba Tremeterra link
item.how_to_find_us: Purchase your own $10 ticket and ask for Joana or Nicole of Meetup

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Samba at Ryles
